box_title: How to Tell If Your Computer is Being Monitored
box_description: The next best way to see if someone is monitoring your computer is to view all of the active connections your computer is making with something on the internet. TCPView is a great way to do this in Windows. Its pretty straightforward in that you see which process on your computer is connected to a specific remote address.

title: How to check to see if my WiFi is being monitored - Quora
description: However, there is a way you can tell if its monitored. During monitoring, a copy may be generated and sent to a mirror port or another destination. This causes a delay. If you can detect this delay that means your traffic is being monitored. Some may disagree, but in order to monitor traffic, it takes some time to stop and analyze.

title: How to Check if Your Browser History is Being Monitored
description: Dec 07, 2014   To look for monitoring software: Press Ctrl + Shift + Esc to run the Windows Task Manager. Look for suspicious software that you dont recognize, such as GoToMyPC, VNC, SilentWatch, SpyAgent, Shadow, or Web Sleuth. Youll find these programs under the "Processes" tab.
